Name: Shadows and Dust
About the game: A ghost story. 'In that sleep of death what dreams may come.' A dim view. A dark room. Someone else is here. Shadows and Dust is a narrative game about regret. It combines short sections of first person exploration with text-based scenes of interactive dialogue. Some choices can't be taken back. Shadows and Dust is a deeply personal experience based on the author's own nightmares. Content warning: suicide, mental illness, depression. Created with Ink, WWISE and Unity 3D. This is a short game. It can be completed in half an hour!
